forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 18C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, becoming mostly sunny this afternoon. High 63F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 64F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High around 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then cloudy with rain likely in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 48F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High near 15C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 47F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
